title: WTB: T206s with double names, also Frank Chance in high grades..
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: WTB: T206s with double names, also Frank Chance in high grades..
posts.post_content: Looking for graded cards with full names on the top and bottom borders. Also looking for high graded Chance cards. PSA Qualifiers OK if the card is strong otherwise, thanks...
Picked up a couple, thanks Luke and John P. Still looking...

checking to see if you have Luther Taylor with double names? I have 1.5, not double.

Danny
